title: GASP: Kat Von D Beautyâ€™s colorful Mini Studded Kiss Rock Candy set is launching this spring
text:
GASP: Kat Von D Beautyâ€™s colorful Mini Studded Kiss Rock Candy set is launching this spring Even though it seems like Kat Von Dâ€™s liquid lipsticks get all the attention, donâ€™t you dare sleep on her Studded Kiss Lipstick collection â€” theyâ€™ve got an insane amount of gorgeous shades wrapped up in incredible packaging for us to enjoy! As if that werenâ€™t enough, Kat has a Mini Studded Kiss set coming out this spring called Rock Candy, and itâ€™s absolutely adorable !
The set includes six brand new shades that look epically bold and bright â€” just the thing to lead us into the impending spring, donâ€™t you agree? The mere thought of these beauties will be what tides us over during the next couple dreary months!
WHAT'S THIS?! â € Meet our new Mini Studded Kiss #RockCandy set â € The set includes SIX brand new ultra-bright shades! â € Coming to Sephora.com on 4/4! â € Who wants to see swatches?! #katvondbeauty #crueltyfreebeauty #vegan

Did you know there's two exclusive shades in the #BetterTogether Cheek & Lip Makeup Bag Set {$38} ?! â € â€¢XO {oxblood}ðŸ¥€ â€¢Muse {shimmery nude}âœ¨â € Available now at @sephora and katvondbeauty.com #TooFacedxKatVonD

Kat Von D KNOWS lipsticks, so we canâ€™t wait to try these gorgeous new minis out for ourselves. These long-wear, highly pigmented lipsticks were specially made to keep your lips velvety smooth, soft, and comfortable. No dry, flaky lips with bleeding edges here!
No word yet on what the set will cost, but weâ€™ll be sure to let you know as soon as we get that information.
Understandably, Katâ€™s fans were just as pumped as we are about this lovely development!
Kat Von D / www.instagram.com Kat Von D / www.instagram.com Do you think Kat cackles at our empty bank accounts every night? If she keeps churning out beauties like these, she can do whatever she wants!
April may seem far away now, but itâ€™ll be here before we know it! And if you need to tide yourself over by perusing the full sized Studded Kiss collection, then so be it!
